name: Travun
description:
Tarvun is a game made during Ludum Dare 46 with the theme "Keep it alive". 

Your Hero will wake up in a strange island with a goat god in front of him. This go explain to him he will die if you didn't help him. With the quest to keep the god alive, you will explore and fight in this little.

We had a lot of fun doing this game, we are quite proud of the results, even if it is not perfect and some work has to be done.

We are pretty satisfied of this final result, and we hope you will enjoy playing it ;) Also, if you have any piece of advice or any question, please, feel free to ask in the comment section ! :)

Instructions before playing:
Use Xbox controller or your keyboard
Use ZQSD or Arrow to move your player
Use E keyboard or A button to interact with object
Use Space or B button to use your spear (you will have it during the game)
